Html:
I'm seeing a problem when ending a call edit by using the tab key. If I use return key or just click the mouse on another cell its ok.

The error is at line 476 in VirtualizedCellInfoCollection.cs - top is being passed in as -1.

Hopefully there will be a fix/workaround otherwise I'll have to start debugging it myself :-(
This is a known issue and will be fixed in the v1 release.
